title: John Mellencamp - Scarecrow (Riya 824 865 2 M 1) 1985
description:
[b]Big Papi wants to include Vine Voice reviews but the good ones are like wikipedia entries.  There is just no way to use one paragraph to explain this album.  It is simply one of the best albums ever released and accurelty reflects the 80's and corporate takeover of the USA, beginning with the farms.  Things have only gotten worse since then.  Play this album.  Put yourself there.  You will feel the same issues going strong today, but with one difference:  We have succumbed to it.  There is no anger and despair, only slight frustration and temporary headlines.  Now go back to your distractions while the destruction of the global economy continues.  Just remember it started right here in the USA with our farms.

- Big Papi[/b]
